Package arcade.patch.sim

Class PatchSimulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • sim.engine.SimState
      • arcade.patch.sim.PatchSimulation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Simulation, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PatchSimulationHex, PatchSimulationRect
    public abstract class PatchSimulation
extends sim.engine.SimState
implements Simulation
    Abstract implementation for patch Simulation instances.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setupAgents

        public final void setupAgents()
        Description copied from interface: Simulation
        Sets up the agents in the grid for the simulation.

        The concrete implementing class calls this and other setup methods from the MASON library start() method, which is called before the schedule starts stepping the simulation.

        Specified by:
        setupAgents in interface Simulation

      • setupEnvironment

        public final void setupEnvironment()
        Description copied from interface: Simulation
        Sets up the environment using lattices for the simulation.

        The concrete implementing class calls this and other setup methods from the MASON library start() method, which is called before the schedule starts stepping the simulation.

        Specified by:
        setupEnvironment in interface Simulation
